name: part_008
file: tmp_【重大告知アリ＆3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX4周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX4周年】 [Z_E5w_pYAck]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: The members of holoX discuss the flyers and large-screen advertisements in Shinjuku, expressing excitement about their visibility.
Takane Lui announces that thousands of people applied for the 'Secret Society holoX' part-time jobs, leading to a comedic discussion about salaries and success.
The members announce the 'holoX Tower Invasion' collaboration event across four major towers in Japan and emphasize the need for advanced reservations.
The next announcement reveals the '4th Anniversary Live Bromide' service, allowing fans to print live photos at convenience stores.
The members begin writing handwritten messages on their digital tablets for the upcoming bromide prints while joking around in the studio.
A mysterious teaser video begins for the fifth announcement, hinting at a collaboration with a well-known work.

subtitles.original: これでもう、本当にあんな風になるんだって...
subtitles.english: I was like, 'Oh, it's actually going to be like that...'

subtitles.original: これで知ってくれた人もいるよね、多分。
subtitles.english: I'm sure some people found out about us through this.

subtitles.original: ね、絶対そう！
subtitles.english: Yeah, definitely!

subtitles.original: もう一枚あります！ドーン！
subtitles.english: There's one more! Boom!

subtitles.original: おおー！えっ、新宿！？
subtitles.english: Whoa! Wait, Shinjuku!?

subtitles.original: 待って待って、後ろにも映ってる！？
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, are we on the screens in the back too!?

subtitles.original: え、あれ聞いた！？
subtitles.english: Eh, did you hear about that!?

subtitles.original: 聞いてない、嘘でしょ！？
subtitles.english: I didn't hear anything, you're kidding me!?

subtitles.original: 待って、今日のあの21時前に流れていた、あのよく分からない映像...
subtitles.english: Wait, that weird video that was playing before 9:00 PM today...

subtitles.original: おい、流れてしまったのかよ！
subtitles.english: Hey, did that actually air!?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫か？あれ、いいのかよ！
subtitles.english: Is that okay? Is that really alright!?

subtitles.original: もっとさ、かっこいいMVとか...
subtitles.english: I thought we'd have like, a cool MV or something...

subtitles.original: ライブ映像とか流したらもっと...
subtitles.english: If we played live footage, it would be even more...

subtitles.original: まあまあまあ、ありがたいね。
subtitles.english: Well, well, it's still something to be grateful for.

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: ということで、こちら！応募どれぐらい来たと思う？
subtitles.english: So, here it is! How many applications do you think we got?

subtitles.original: 300人！でもお仕事だからね。
subtitles.english: 300 people! But since it's a job...

subtitles.original: 500人とか来てくれてるんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Maybe around 500 people applied?

subtitles.original: 1000人とかじゃない？大変だからね。
subtitles.english: Maybe 1000? It's tough work, after all.

subtitles.original: なんと、数千人の応募が来たということです！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, we received several thousand applications!

subtitles.original: すごすぎる！ありがとー！
subtitles.english: That's incredible! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 驚きすぎた！
subtitles.english: I'm so surprised!

subtitles.original: うわああああ！
subtitles.english: Waaaah!

subtitles.original: 誰か給料もらってるせいで！
subtitles.english: It's because someone's getting paid!

subtitles.original: いろはよりも多めに渡してます。
subtitles.english: I'm giving them more than Iroha.

subtitles.original: やめてー！しっかり福利厚生、ラプ様ですから！
subtitles.english: Stop it! La-plus-sama provides solid benefits!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！掃除係の皆もありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! And thanks to the cleaning crew too!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: そして、次はなんだ？
subtitles.english: And what's next?

subtitles.original: 告知③ タイアップコラボ詳細決定！
subtitles.english: Announcement 3: Tie-up Collaboration Details Finalized!

subtitles.original: オープン！来い来い来い！
subtitles.english: Open! Here it comes!

subtitles.original: タワーコラボだー！
subtitles.english: It's a tower collaboration!

subtitles.original: 俺がタワーになる！タ、タ、タワー！
subtitles.english: I'll be the tower! T-T-Tower!

subtitles.original: タワーコラボ、もう情報公開されていますが、こちら！
subtitles.english: Information about the tower collab is already out, but look at this!

subtitles.original: 全国4箇所で行われる、holoX Tower Invasion！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Happening at four locations nationwide: holoX Tower Invasion! Yay!

subtitles.original: 12月4日から開催されます！
subtitles.english: It starts on December 4th!

subtitles.original: さっぽろテレビ塔、東京タワー、中部電力 MIRAI TOWER、梅田スカイビルで開催されます！
subtitles.english: It'll be at Sapporo TV Tower, Tokyo Tower, Chubu Electric Power MIRAI TOWER, and Umeda Sky Building!

subtitles.original: ぜひ皆さん、行ってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Please make sure to go, everyone!

subtitles.original: 俺たちがholoX十タワーです！
subtitles.english: We are the holoX Ten-Tower!

subtitles.original: おい待て待て、今回大事なことがあるんですけど...
subtitles.english: Hey, wait a minute, there's something important about this...

subtitles.original: ちゃんと予約をしないと、皆さん入れないんで。事前予約必須です！
subtitles.english: You can't get in without a reservation. Advanced booking is mandatory!

subtitles.original: そうなんです。事前予約、忘れてる人もいると思うので。
subtitles.english: That's right. I'm sure some people might forget about the pre-booking.

subtitles.original: その場で行っても入れないらしいんで。
subtitles.english: Apparently, you can't just show up and walk in.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、予約を忘れないように！
subtitles.english: Everyone, don't forget to make your reservations!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: We're counting on you!

subtitles.original: 次、次！
subtitles.english: Next, next!

subtitles.original: 告知④ 4周年ライブブロマイド発売決定！
subtitles.english: Announcement 4: 4th Anniversary Live Bromide Release!

subtitles.original: オープン！はい！
subtitles.english: Open! Yes!

subtitles.original: なんと、ホロライブの新サービス、ライブの感動最速でお届け！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, Hololive's new service will deliver the excitement of the live show instantly!

subtitles.original: おお、すごい！え、どういうこと？
subtitles.english: Oh, wow! Wait, what do you mean?

subtitles.original: 秘密結社holoX、4周年のライブブロマイドが、なんと！
subtitles.english: The Secret Society holoX 4th Anniversary Live Bromides, check this out!

subtitles.original: 今日のライブの写真が、明日からコンビニでプリントアウトできるんだって！
subtitles.english: Photos from today's live will be available to print at convenience stores starting tomorrow!

subtitles.original: すぐに手に入るんだ！
subtitles.english: You can get them right away!

subtitles.original: 対象店舗は、ファミリーマート、ローソン、ミニストップになります！
subtitles.english: The participating stores are FamilyMart, Lawson, and Ministop!

subtitles.original: いっぱいあるね、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: That's a lot of places. Thank you!

subtitles.original: そして、今からネットで事前購入ができるらしいです！
subtitles.english: And apparently, you can pre-purchase them online starting now!

subtitles.original: マジ！？ただね、明日からコンビニでも写真を選びながら購入することもできるみたいなので。
subtitles.english: Seriously!? Also, from tomorrow, you can choose and buy photos at the convenience stores too.

subtitles.original: 詳しくは、左下のリンクから確認してみてください！
subtitles.english: For details, please check the link in the bottom left!

subtitles.original: こっち、こっち！
subtitles.english: Over here, over here!

subtitles.original: さらにですね、今回はお写真にですね、ブロマイドに私たちのメッセージをつけることができるみたいなんですけど...
subtitles.english: Furthermore, this time, we can apparently add our messages to the bromide photos...

subtitles.original: え、いいの！？
subtitles.english: Eh, is that okay!?

subtitles.original: 今から書く！？
subtitles.english: Are we writing them now!?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、急すぎないか！？
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, isn't this too sudden!?

subtitles.original: 浮いてる、浮いてる！
subtitles.english: They're floating, they're floating!

subtitles.original: 何も考えてないけど、まあ、考えて書いてください！
subtitles.english: I haven't thought of anything, but please, think and write something!

subtitles.original: はい！え、ちょ、待って...
subtitles.english: Okay! Eh, wait, wait...

subtitles.original: 時間もね、迫ってますからね。早く書いて！
subtitles.english: Time is running out, so write quickly!

subtitles.original: にゃんにゃん。意外と集中力...
subtitles.english: Nyan nyan. I'm actually focusing...

subtitles.original: オッケー、書けたー！早い！
subtitles.english: Okay, done! So fast!

subtitles.original: 待って、これ。見せて！
subtitles.english: Wait, look at this. Show me!

subtitles.original: あ、いい、こよっぽい。いつまで書いてんねん！
subtitles.english: Ah, nice, that's so Koyo-like. How long are you going to take!

subtitles.original: みんな終わった？回収、回収！
subtitles.english: Is everyone done? Collect them, collect them!

subtitles.original: 画面に出して！お願いしますね。
subtitles.english: Put them on the screen! Please.

subtitles.original: みんな何書いたかすごく気になると思うんですが...
subtitles.english: I'm sure everyone is curious about what we wrote...

subtitles.original: メッセージの内容は、みんなが...私が書いたのは、あ、内緒！
subtitles.english: The content of the messages is... what I wrote was, oh, it's a secret!

subtitles.original: ダメですよ！言わないで！
subtitles.english: You can't do that! Don't tell them!

subtitles.original: 買ってからのお楽しみ。ダメに決まってんだろ！
subtitles.english: Wait until you buy them. Of course you can't say it now!

subtitles.original: はい。そして...
subtitles.english: Yes. And...

subtitles.original: まだ2枚もあるんで、お次はこちら！
subtitles.english: We still have two more left, so here's the next one!

subtitles.original: 告知⑤ 「あの作品とコラボ！？」
subtitles.english: Announcement 5: "Collab with THAT work!?"

subtitles.original: なんと、あの作品とコラボ！？え？
subtitles.english: Wait, a collaboration with THAT work!? What?

subtitles.original: なに、なに！？どれだ！？
subtitles.english: What, what!? Which one is it!?

subtitles.original: あの作品ってなんですか？こちらをどうぞ！
subtitles.english: What is 'that work'? Take a look at this!

subtitles.original: サテーー
subtitles.english: Well then...

subtitles.original: 突然デハアルガ、
subtitles.english: It's sudden, but...

subtitles.original: 或ル秘密結社ノ
subtitles.english: Of a certain secret society's

subtitles.original: 人間ハ、話ヲシヨウ。
subtitles.english: Humans, let's talk.
